name: Madeleine and the Candy Witch's Curse (Demo)
name_original: Madeleine and the Candy Witch's Curse (Demo)
description:
Madeleine and the Candy Witch's Curse is an rpg puzzle horror game about a little girl named Madeleine, who found a cursed puppet. Together they explore a magical house filled with puzzles and some horrors brought to life by a candy-themed witch in order to reverse the curse.

A Demo created for the Cute yet Creepy Game Jam.

*The game contains horror elements, candy gore, body horror (mostly of the candy kind), and some monsters. It may not be suitable for people for everyone.
*It's recommended to wear headphones for the best gameplay experience.

This game while fully playable is still a demo with no official end. 
If there are any problems with the game, either bugs or personal suggestions, let us know! Feedback is helpful!

Version 1.1:
Edited the first area and introduction to better showcase the mechanics of the game. 

Version 1.2
Fixed a bug that occurred with the Yellow Bookshelf.
